name: dissipative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to dissipation (= the process of gradually disappearing or losing energy, for example by cooling down): The process of decay is a fundamental part of any dissipative system. There is an essential tension between energy inflow and dissipative outflow.
More examplesFewer examplesDissipative systems lose energy through some dissipative mechanism such as friction or viscosity.As a result, we obtain the dissipative term, which depends on the mobility of charged particles.All the molecules in a dissipative structure are in cooperative interaction.
